content: be divisible by 12 *k2 p2 repeat from * for 8 rnds body using larger needles work rnds 1-8 of eyelet lace stitch pattern 5 6 times on 5th 6th repeat end with round 7 4 crown decrease set-up round k 18 20 *pm k 18 20 repeat from * around decrease round 1 *k2tog k to 2 sts before m ssk repeat from *around 96 108 sts next round k around decrease round 2 repeat last 2 rnds 7 8 more times or until you have 12 sts remaining remove all st markers except for the bor marker during the last decrease round next round k2tog around 6 sts break yarn leaving a 6 /15 cm long tail using a tapestry needle thread tail through remaining 6 sts pulling tightly to close hole finishing to block soak in warm water and mild soap reshape and lay flat to dry weave in all loose ends final notes a huge thank you to everyone who has helped make this pattern possible i couldn t release patterns without my amazing yarn contributors test knitters and tech editor if you have any questions about this pattern please email judy@theautumnacorn com for more of my pattern designs http //www theautumnacorn com or http //www ravelry com/designers/the-autumn-acorn you can also find me on ig as @theautumnacorn and in my fb group as the autumn acorn knits please tag me in your photos with @theautumnacorn and using the hashtag #norwegianfirhat i have a web shop where i offer free patterns at www theautumnacorn com and an etsy shop called the autumn acorn finally don t forget to check out my monthly knitting and crocheting podcast on youtube called the autumn acorn knits ~judy 5 *copyright 2021 the autumn acorn pattern is intended for personal use only other uses are strictly prohibited all rights reserved 6
